com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates
Interface Template

public interface Template

A template. It consists of a tree of template elements. A template should be stateless; all information regarding the processing of a template is kept in a template context.

Each time a template processes one of its children, it should keep the internal implicit object in the context up to date. At the very least, it should provide the following information:

  • The current template (i.e. itself) under key "template";
  • The template context under key "template.context".

Field Summary
static String TEMPLATE_CONTEXT_KEY
          The key under which the template context should be stored in the context's implicit map.

Method Detail

processChildren

void processChildren(TemplateContext templateContext,
                     Context context,
                     Writer writer)
                     throws TemplateException
Processes the children of a template context's current template element. If the template context does not have a current template element, the elements at the root of this template will be processed.

Parameters:
templateContext - the context that contains the current template element
context - the context to process the template elements in
writer - the writer to use for the template elements
Throws:
TemplateException - when one of the template elements can't be processed

getParent

TemplateElement getParent(TemplateElement templateElement)
                          throws TemplateException
Finds the parent of a certain template element.

Parameters:
templateElement - the template element to find the parent of
Returns:
the template element that's the parent of the given template element
Throws:
TemplateException - when this template does not contain the given template element

getChildren

List<TemplateElement> getChildren(TemplateElement templateElement)
                                  throws TemplateException
Finds the children of a certain template element.

Parameters:
templateElement - the template element to find the children of
Returns:
the template elements that have the given template element as their parent
Throws:
TemplateException - when this template does not contain the given template element
